channel.title: Connection error when loading client?
channel.description: i uploaded my client for my server to uppit, my friend downloaded it and tried to run it said, requesting title screen, then said connection error- retrying in 5..4..3..etc. i downloaded it on my lap top and got the same problem too, whats wrong with it??

item.title: Connection error when loading client?
item.dc:creator: @Chase2 Chase™
item.description:
@Chase2 wrote:

i’ll try changing it, thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 05, 2009, 10:44:40 pm[/size][hr]it didnt work =[[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 06, 2009, 05:38:23 am[/size][hr]any other ideas?
